classSpec.desc: provides attributes for normalization of elements that contain datable events using the ISO 8601 standard.
proporciona atributos para la normalización de elementos que contienen eventos datables usando el estándard ISO 8601.

attDef.desc: supplies the value of a date or time in a standard form.
日付や時間を，標準形式で示す．
attDef.valDesc: Any string representing a valid date, time, or one of a variety of combinations.

exemplum.p: The following are examples of ISO date, time, and date & time formats that are not valid W3C format normalizations.

egXML.date: a few minutes after ten in the morning on Thu 18 May

exemplum.p: All of the examples of the when attribute in the att.datable.w3c class are also valid with respect to this attribute.

exemplum.egXML: He likes to be punctual. I said around noon, and he showed up at 12 O'clock on the dot.
exemplum.p: The second occurence of time could have been encoded with the when attribute, as 12:00:00 is a valid time with respect to the W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes specification. The first occurence could not.

remarks.p: The value of when-iso should be the normalized representation of the date, time, or combined date & time in one of the formats specified in ISO 8601. The calendar attribute, if present, describes the calendar of the content of the element, not the calendar used for the when or when-iso attribute, which is always in the Gregorian or proleptic Gregorian calendar.

attDef.desc: specifies the earliest possible date for the event in standard form, e.g. yyyy-mm-dd.
indica la fecha más temprana posible para un evento en un formato estándard, p.ej. aaaa-mm-dd.
当該事象の一番古い日付を，標準形式で示す．例えば，yyyy-mm-dd．
attDef.valDesc: A normalized form of temporal expression conforming ISO 8601.

attDef.desc: specifies the latest possible date for the event in standard form, e.g. yyyy-mm-dd.
indica la fecha más tardana posible para un evento en un formato estándard, p.ej. aaaa-mm-dd.
当該事象の一番新しい日付を，標準形式で示す．例えば，yyyy-mm-dd．
attDef.valDesc: A normalized form of temporal expression conforming ISO 8601.

attDef.desc: indicates the starting point of the period in standard form.
indica el punto de inicio de un periodo de tiempo en formato estándard.
attDef.valDesc: A normalized form of temporal expression conforming ISO 8601.

attDef.desc: indicates the ending point of the period in standard form.
attDef.valDesc: A normalized form of temporal expression conforming ISO 8601.
